Informasjonskapsler er sm√• tekstfiler s: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They are used to store information between visits.
En sesjon er en midlertidig tilkobling m: A session is a temporary connection between you and the website, securely stored on our server. We store session data for up to 5 days or until you log out (or request data deletion). After that, it's automatically deleted, and you will need to log in again. The cookie in your browser contains only an ID and no sensitive information.

DiscGolf, also known as frisbee golf, is a sport where players throw a disc (frisbee) at a metal basket. The goal is to complete each course with as few throws as possible ‚Äì similar to traditional golf. The sport is easy to learn, inexpensive to start, and suitable for all ages.
The game starts from a tee pad, and you throw from where the disc lands.
Hullet er fullf√∏rt n√•r disken havner i: The hole is completed when the disc lands in the basket or hits the chains.
If the disc goes out of bounds (OB), you receive a penalty throw and continue from the point it went out.
Players should respect others and clean up after themselves.
Det brukes ulike typer disker:: Different types of discs are used:
for short, precise throws toward the basket.
To eller tre kast under par (-2, -3): Two or three throws under par (-2, -3)
